meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by inflection.
meanings.sent1: The inflectional endings on the words show how they change.
meanings.sent2: She studied the inflectional patterns in different languages.
meanings.sent3: The inflectional dance of the words made them seem alive.
meanings.sent4: His inflectional voice rose and fell with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The inflectional nature of language adds depth and meaning.

meanings.definition: Showing variation in form to express different grammatical categories.
meanings.sent1: The inflectional forms of the verbs indicate tense and number.
meanings.sent2: The inflectional changes in the nouns help convey meaning.
meanings.sent3: The inflectional cupcakes were decorated in different styles.
meanings.sent4: Her inflectional artwork transformed throughout the exhibit.
meanings.sent5: The inflectional colors of the chameleon amazed the children.
